titles.title: Real Estate Exchange Fairness Act of 2021
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat Puerto Rico as part of the United States for purposes of determining whether real property qualifies for treatment as a like-kind exchange.
Real Estate Exchange Fairness Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Real Estate Exchange Fairness Act of 2021
This bill requires Puerto Rico to be treated as part of the United States for the purpose of determining if an exchange of real property qualifies as a like-kind exchange for tax purposes. (Under current law, real property located in the United States and real property located outside of the United States are not property of a like kind.)
